appearance.description: medium build, gentle eyes, calloused hands from years of work

life_timeline.description: Started elementary school during the Cultural Revolution period
life_timeline.details: School was often disrupted, learned basic reading and arithmetic under difficult conditions. Family struggled financially but emphasized education.

life_timeline.description: Graduated high school and entered technical college
life_timeline.details: One of the first in family to pursue higher education. Studied mechanical engineering at local technical institute.

life_timeline.description: Started first job at state-owned factory
life_timeline.details: Worked as junior technician in large manufacturing plant. Learned practical skills and work discipline.

work_details.main_challenge: Adapting to industrial work environment and learning complex machinery

life_timeline.details: Met during technical college, married after both found stable jobs. Simple wedding ceremony with family and close friends.

life_timeline.description: First child born - daughter Zhang Lin
life_timeline.details: Became father during China's one-child policy period. Focused on providing good education for daughter.

life_timeline.description: Promoted to senior technician and team leader
life_timeline.details: Recognized for technical skills and reliability. Started leading small team of younger workers.

work_details.daily_routine: Supervised equipment maintenance and trained new workers
work_details.main_challenge: Managing people and dealing with factory modernization

life_timeline.details: State enterprise reforms led to layoffs and restructuring. Worried about job security and family future.

life_timeline.description: Transitioned to private company as technical consultant
life_timeline.details: Used accumulated experience to work with smaller private manufacturing companies. More flexible but less stable income.

work_details.daily_routine: Provided technical advice and troubleshooting services
work_details.main_challenge: Building client relationships and managing irregular income

life_timeline.description: Daughter graduated from university and found good job
life_timeline.details: Zhang Lin graduated with engineering degree and started career at technology company. Proud of her success despite economic difficulties.

life_timeline.description: Started learning computer skills and digital tools
life_timeline.details: Recognized need to adapt to changing technology. Enrolled in evening computer classes to stay relevant in work.

life_timeline.description: Started elementary school during China's economic opening period
life_timeline.details: Grew up in small city experiencing rapid economic development. Parents emphasized education and cultural development.

life_timeline.description: Enrolled in university business program in Beijing
life_timeline.details: First in family to study in major city. Studied international business during China's WTO entry period.

life_timeline.description: Started career at foreign trade company
life_timeline.details: Worked in import/export business during China's manufacturing boom. Learned English and international business practices.

work_details.daily_routine: Handled export documentation and client communication
work_details.main_challenge: Learning international business protocols and improving English

life_timeline.details: Pursued evening MBA to advance career. Balanced work, study, and personal life during intense period.

life_timeline.description: Joined multinational corporation as marketing manager
life_timeline.details: Moved to larger company with international operations. Responsible for China market development.

work_details.daily_routine: Developed marketing strategies and managed client relationships
work_details.main_challenge: Adapting to corporate culture and managing larger teams

life_timeline.details: Met through mutual friends in tech industry. Modern wedding ceremony blending traditional and contemporary elements.
Became mother during China's economic boom period. Balanced career advancement with family responsibilities.

child_details.name: Wang Mingxuan
child_details.behavior: loves building things and asking questions
child_details.main_issue: finding balance between screen time and outdoor activities

life_timeline.details: Led successful product launches and market expansion. Recognized for innovative marketing strategies in competitive market.

life_timeline.description: Navigated company restructuring during economic uncertainty
life_timeline.details: Economic slowdown led to company changes. Adapted to new priorities while maintaining team morale and performance.
